verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician, <WH5329> Altaschith, <WH516> Michtam <WH4387> of David; <WH1732> when Saul <WH7586> sent, <WH7971> and they watched <WH8104> the house <WH1004> to kill <WH4191> him. Deliver <WH5337> me from my enemies, <WH341> O my God: <WH430> defend <WH7682> me from them that rise <WH6965> up against me.
Deliver <WH5337> me from the workers <WH6466> of iniquity, <WH205> and save <WH3467> me from bloody <WH1818> men. <WH582>

For, see, <WH2009> they lie in wait <WH693> for my soul: <WH5315> the mighty <WH5794> are gathered <WH1481> against <WH5921> me; not for my transgression, <WH6588> nor <WH3808> for my sin, <WH2403> O LORD. <WH3068>
They run <WH7323> and prepare <WH3559> themselves without <WH1097> my fault: <WH5771> awake <WH5782> to help <WH7125> me, and behold. <WH7200>

You therefore, O LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts, <WH6635> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> awake <WH6974> to visit <WH6485> all <WH3605> the heathen: <WH1471> be not merciful <WH2603> to any <WH3605> wicked <WH205> transgressors. <WH898> Selah. <WH5542>
They return <WH7725> at evening: <WH6153> they make a noise <WH1993> like a dog, <WH3611> and go <WH5437> round <WH5437> about the city. <WH5892>
Behold, <WH2009> they belch <WH5042> out with their mouth: <WH6310> swords <WH2719> are in their lips: <WH8193> for who, <WH4310> say they, does hear? <WH8085>
But you, O LORD, <WH3068> shall laugh <WH7832> at them; you shall have all <WH3605> the heathen <WH1471> in derision. <WH3932>
Because of his strength <WH5797> will I wait <WH8104> on you: for God <WH430> is my defense. <WH4869>
The God <WH430> of my mercy <WH2617> shall prevent <WH6923> me: God <WH430> shall let me see <WH7200> my desire on my enemies. <WH8324>
Slay <WH2026> them not, lest <WH6435> my people <WH5971> forget: <WH7911> scatter <WH5128> them by your power; <WH2428> and bring <WH3381> them down, <WH3381> O Lord <WH136> our shield. <WH4043>

For the sin <WH2403> of their mouth <WH6310> and the words <WH1697> of their lips <WH8193> let them even be taken <WH3920> in their pride: <WH1347> and for cursing <WH423> and lying <WH3585> which they speak. <WH5608>

Consume <WH3615> them in wrath, <WH2534> consume <WH3615> them, that they may not be: and let them know <WH3045> that God <WH430> rules <WH4910> in Jacob <WH3290> to the ends <WH657> of the earth. <WH776> Selah. <WH5542>
And at evening <WH6153> let them return; <WH7725> and let them make a noise <WH1993> like a dog, <WH3611> and go <WH5437> round <WH5437> about the city. <WH5892>
Let them wander <WH5128> up and down for meat, <WH398> and grudge <WH3885> if <WH518> they be not satisfied. <WH7646>

But I will sing <WH7891> of your power; <WH5797> yes, I will sing <WH7442> aloud <WH7442> of your mercy <WH2617> in the morning: <WH1242> for you have been <WH1961> my defense <WH4869> and refuge <WH4498> in the day <WH3117> of my trouble. <WH6862>
To you, O my strength, <WH5797> will I sing: <WH2167> for God <WH430> is my defense, <WH4869> and the God <WH430> of my mercy. <WH2617>
